<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2239</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fossil fuels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fossilbrennstoffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combustibles fossiles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combustíveis fossil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Combustibili fossili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απολιθωμένα καύσιμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Combustibles fósiles</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An explanation of non renewable energy resources in the world (fossil fuels including oils, natural gas and coal)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Erklärung der Betriebsmittel der nicht 
auswechselbaren Energie in der Welt (Fossilbrennstoffe einschließlich
Öle, Erdgas und Kohle)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une explication des ressources énergétiques non 
renouvelables dans le monde (combustibles fossiles comprenant les 
pétroles, le gaz naturel et le charbon)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma explanação de recursos de energia non 
renewable no mundo (combustíveis fossil including óleos, o gás 
natural e o carvão)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una spiegazione delle risorse energetiche non 
rinnovabili nel mondo (combustibili fossili compreso i petroli, il gas
naturale ed il carbone)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εξήγηση των μη ανανεώσιμων ενεργειακών στοιχείων 
συμπεριφοράς στον κόσμο (απολιθωμένα καύσιμα συμπεριλαμβανομένων 
των πετρελαίων, φυσική αέριο και του άνθρακα)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una explicación de los recursos energéticos no 
reanudables en el mundo (combustibles fósiles incluyendo los aceites,
el gas natural y el carbón)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftstoffe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carburants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">combustibles</string>
          </keyword>
